column4: Sometimes, Ubuntu does not recognize my keyboard or mouse on startup. Rebooting, usually once, but no more than twice, always fixes it. The mouse and keyboard are never not recognized at the same time; only spearately. Hlep?
USB, PS/2, bluetooth? Pastebin (http://pastebin.com) the output of lsusb.
